articles.title: New Moon, Planets And Earth Farthest From Sun: The Night Sky This Week - Forbes
articles.description: Each Monday, I pick out North America’s celestial highlights for the week ahead. From July 1-7, there's a chance to observe the moon, Mars, Jupiter, and more.
